text: Muminagana, tomara nijederake ebam tomadera paribara-parijanake se'i agni theke raksa kara, yara indhana habe manusa o prastara, yate niyojita ache pasana hrdaya, kathorasbabhaba pheresatagana. Tara allaha taâ€™ala ya adesa karena, ta aman'ya kare na ebam ya karate adesa kara haya, ta'i kare.
